alert.note: Alert for Logan; Scott (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 3:43PM CDT until July 21 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Logan County in western Arkansas... Northwestern Scott County in western Arkansas... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 342 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mansfield, or 9 miles northwest of Waldron, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Waldron... Mansfield... Oliver... Morgan Springs... Cauthron... Winfield... Hon... Lucas... Elm Park... Liberty... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
